General.Name: Libet S.A.
General.Description: Libet S.A. manufactures and sells paving stones and other elements in Poland. The company's products include paving stones, terrace slabs, concrete slabs, porcelain stoneware tiles, palisades/walls/fences, stair treads, outskirts/curbs, terrace supports, preparations and tools, eco surfaces, architectural concrete, external lighting, design service. Its products are used in designer and functional borders, walls, flowerbeds, and fences. The company also sells its products through its stores, as well as online platform. Libet S.A. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Wroclaw, Poland.
